keys: comprensión de lectura y que escucha

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">In the Clothes Shop 2</string>
            <string language="en">In the Clothes Shop 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Kleidung-System 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans le système 2 de vêtements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na loja 2 da roupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel negozio 2 dei vestiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο κατάστημα 2 ενδυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el departamento 2 de las ropas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">This exercise contains a short, simple story about a young man who decides to go out and buy a new piece of clothing. The story is followed by questions on the content.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">This exercise contains a short, simple story about a young man who decide to go out and buy a new piece of clothing. The story is followed by questions on the content. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">money</string>
            <string language="sv">clothes</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">money</string>
            <string language="en">clothes</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Übung enthält eine kurze, einfache 
Geschichte über einen jungen Mann, das entscheiden zu erlöschen und 
kauft ein neues Stück Kleidung. Die Geschichte wird von den 
Fragen über den Inhalt verfolgt. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet exercice contient une histoire courte et 
simple au sujet d'un jeune homme qui décident de sortir et achète un
nouveau morceau d'habillement. L'histoire est suivie des 
questions sur le contenu. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour 
des débutants - module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este exercício contem uma história curta, 
simples sobre um homem novo que se decide sair e compra uma parte nova
de roupa. A história é seguida por perguntas no índice. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esercitazione contiene una storia corta e 
semplice circa un giovane che decide uscire e compra una nuova parte 
di vestiti. La storia è seguita dalle domande sul soddisfare. 
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - 
quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η άσκηση περιέχει μια σύντομη, απλή ιστορία για
έναν νεαρό άνδρα που αποφασίζουν να βγούν και να αγοράσουν ένα 
νέο κομμάτι του ιματισμού. Η ιστορία ακολουθείται από τις 
ερωτήσεις στο περιεχόμενο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este ejercicio contiene una historia corta, 
simple sobre un hombre joven que decide a salir y compra un nuevo 
pedazo de ropa. La historia es seguida por preguntas sobre el 
contenido. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
